1514390.name: 7D Maze
1514390.description:
7D Maze is a challenging, mind-bending, puzzle game that explores the 7 dimensions. Using a unique, limited movement system, dash through a series of increasingly complex labyrinths.

Features


  • 70 Challenging Levels: Increasing complexity with each new labyrinth.

  • 7 Dimensions: Adds a new, mind-bending layer to the 2D-puzzle genre.

  • Casual, minimalist gameplay: Incredibly easy to learn, pick-up, and play!

  • Adaptive music: Enjoy the relaxing, acoustic chillstep.
1514390.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
